thread.section_title: Villa Royale Montsouris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: This Hotel Feels really old
thread.title_full: This Hotel Feels really old - Review of Villa Royale Montsouris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ahmad A
title: This Hotel Feels really old
text:
Hotel is good in location with a short walk to metro station , but the hotel itself is really old in design and sometimes its really dim and i cant see in side the closet i had to open my mobile flash. i did not like the bathroom at all, it is really small and i got a shower placed in the opposite side of the wall so my bathroom was wet everytime i got a bath.
The Breakfast was very limited with options , sometimes i didnt find expect bread and cheese.
what is good was the 4G mobile phone that you could use for free, but it was really slow and lagging that at the end i didnt use it at all. and the hotel staff were friendly
overall, this hotel is average compared to value you Pay, but i stayed for 3 nights in a hotel in champs elese and it was cheaper and way modern than this one .
